Date: May 16, 2002
Email: edum@hkem.com

Dear Sir,

I am Mr. Eduado de Mello, a former commander of the Union for the Total Independence of Angola, UNITA. The recent events in Angola, including the loss of my superior, have led me to reconsider my involvement in the conflict. I have taken a decision to step away from the armed struggle and seek a new life in South Africa temporarily. As part of my past responsibilities, I have access to $32 million, originally intended for the purchase of weapons, which is now available for other use. If you are willing to assist me in handling this sum, I am prepared to offer you 20% of the total amount. Please respond to edum@hkem.com, and I will facilitate the transfer of the funds. Your cooperation is appreciated in this matter.

Thank you,
Eduado de Mello

_______________________________________________
dcms-dev mailing list
dcms-dev@eros.cs.jhu.edu
http://www.eros-os.org/mailman/listinfo/dcms-dev

2af2128a-ea41-4945-b44b-06761629d472.body: Dear Sir, I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to seek your assistance and guidance for myself and my children. I recently came across your contact details in my late husband's address book and felt compelled to reach out to you. I believe you are a trustworthy individual who can offer support without any form of intimidation or betrayal of trust. My name is Anne Kojo, and I hail from Konobo in the Kerema local district of Sierra Leone. I am the widow of the late Dr. Mundi A. Kojo, who tragically lost his life due to the conflict in Sierra Leone. Before his untimely death, my husband entrusted me and our children, Ibrahim and Amina, with the task of leaving Sierra Leone to ensure our safety amidst the civil unrest. We managed to flee to Togo with some valuables, including a sum of $25 million, which is currently held with a Trust Company in Togo. I seek your assistance in accessing these funds and facilitating their transfer to your country for investment purposes. Your involvement is crucial as we aim to secure a stable future for my children. I am willing to offer a significant reward of 20% of the total sum for your help. For security reasons, I recommend finalizing the arrangements with my son, Ibrahim Kojo. Please reach out to him at ibrahimkojo@caramail.com when you are ready to proceed. Your discretion and confidentiality are appreciated in this matter. Thank you for your understanding and support. Warm regards, Anne Kojo.

5e550657-53bb-4bf9-9523-16ac3ef064e0.body:
In today's marketing landscape, direct email advertising stands out as a powerful tool. It resembles receiving a personalized message in your inbox, akin to a letter from a postman. Transmitting your product, service, website, or networking opportunity to a vast audience instantly represents the pinnacle of advertisers' dreams for decades. We distribute your concise promotion to a set of our hand-picked addresses—a cost-effective solution for rapid outreach.

Why are we so confident about email marketing's effectiveness? It's simple - because we specialize in precisely that. The efficacy of direct email marketing in attracting new business and driving impressive profits is well-documented, and our own success story demonstrates this. As a reputable internet marketing company, we assist clients in promoting their offerings through email campaigns, leveraging the potential of this marketing medium while ensuring affordability.

STANDARD RATES AND DETAILS

EXTRACTION:
Our mailing list consists of carefully curated internet addresses sourced from reputable websites. To maintain quality, these addresses undergo thorough verification and filtration checks. We meticulously screen each address against our extensive database, removing irrelevant domains and complying with opt-out requests.

EVALUATION: $350.00 (optional)
Our marketing experts provide a detailed assessment of your sales letter, offering recommendations to enhance its impact and effectiveness.

STANDARD PRICING: (Emails Sent)
1 Million - $700.00
2 Million - $600.00
3 Million - $500.00
4 Million & above - $400.00 per million

SPECIAL PROMOTION!
Avail of our introductory package at $300.00, including setup, sales letter evaluation, and delivery of 500,000 emails.

PAYMENT TERMS:
All services must be prepaid before the delivery of the advertisement.

NOTICE: We strictly prohibit the dissemination of any material deemed threatening or inappropriate.

For those interested in Direct Email Marketing, please fax the completed form to (602) 392-8288:

Contact Name:
Business Name:
Years in Business:
Business Type:
Address:
City, State, Zip, Country:
Email Address:

333bacb7-c38d-443c-a088-7e1dd7b23d87.body: This is an innovative mailing software called 'BonFire', designed for sending bulk emails conveniently and securely. It ensures anonymous delivery without revealing your IP address. The software is user-friendly, allowing you to easily send emails after setting up your message and recipient list. BonFire utilizes proxy routing for true anonymity, making it unnecessary to search for relays or pay for open servers. It operates at high speeds and is not affected by port 25 blocking. The pricing involves purchasing email credits in blocks, with various packages available at competitive prices. Each purchase includes a free bulletproof mailbox. Performance is optimized for various connection types, and the choice of email lists and message size can impact delivery speed. BonFire emphasizes the importance of a compelling subject line and offers options for sending either HTML or text messages. Click [Here](mailto:bonfire1@btamail.net.cn?subject=I am interested in BonFire) to receive BonFire.

07a439cb-57ee-4e96-8f82-401ad60c6dd9.body: FROM THE DESK OF: Dr. Tom Eke E-Mail: dr_tomeke@spinfinder.com Lagos, Nigeria.  Dear Friend,  I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to you regarding a confidential business opportunity that I believe might interest you. This opportunity requires the utmost discretion due to its sensitive nature. Although I understand that initial skepticism is natural in such matters, I assure you that all precautions have been taken to ensure a smooth and risk-free process.  Allow me to introduce myself - I am Dr. Tom Eke, a Director General at the Department of Petroleum Resources (D.P.R) overseeing Contract Awards and Payment Approvals. We have identified you as a trustworthy individual who can assist us in transferring a significant sum of money to a foreign account. This fund originates from an over-inflated contract sum intended for distribution among us as officials.  To proceed, we require your cooperation to facilitate the transfer of $31 million to your account. In recognition of your assistance, you will receive 20% of the total amount, while the remaining sum will be divided among officials. Rest assured, this transaction is entirely legal and devoid of any illicit activities.  Your involvement is crucial, and we request your complete honesty, confidentiality, and trust throughout this process. If you are willing to collaborate, I will provide further details and instructions to ensure a successful transfer within a reasonable timeframe.  Kindly acknowledge receipt of this message at the provided email address. I eagerly await your response to initiate this mutually beneficial endeavor. Thank you for your time and consideration.  Sincerely, Dr. Tom Eke  NB: Please note that this business transaction is legitimate and complies with all legal regulations.

69bdfe96-d22f-483e-a255-9685f70bec47.body: Dear Recipient, I hope this message finds you well. I need to share a sensitive matter with you regarding my family's difficult situation. Due to circumstances beyond our control, I am reaching out for your discreet assistance in relocating and managing some family assets. I came across your contact information and believe you could help in a confidential manner. My name is Michael Kamah, and I am seeking help due to the unfortunate events my family faced during the political crisis in our home country. My father and brother were casualties, and my family had to move to South Africa with nothing. My late father had funds deposited abroad which we need help relocating. I am requesting your assistance in representing me to a Finance and Security Company and managing the funds once they are relocated. I trust your integrity and confidentiality. Please reply urgently. Best Regards, Michael Kamah.

fccf48a0-57bc-46db-9419-ccd7b1ba4b2e.body: Dear Sir, I am Barrister Williams Falana, a respected member of the Nigeria Bar Association (NBA). Your details came to my attention through the World Business Encyclopaedia. Therefore, I would like to share a confidential opportunity with you for our mutual benefit. A significant amount of USD48M (Forty-eight Million United States Dollars) was entrusted to a security company in Nigeria by the late Head of State, General Sani Abacha, for safekeeping. This money is stored in secure vaults labeled as personal belongings, unbeknownst to the security company about its actual contents. Originally intended for political campaign funds, the late head of state shared the relevant documentation regarding this deposit with me before his passing. With all arrangements already in place, an offshore Security Company will facilitate the transfer of this sum as a consignment through diplomatic channels to their offshore affiliate office. You will then be required to claim the consignment as the rightful beneficiary. Please note that this transaction is secure and entirely risk-free, devoid of any illicit funds involvement. Should you be interested in proceeding, you will receive 20% of the total sum for your assistance, with 5% allocated for general expenses and the remaining 75% divided amongst us. To proceed, kindly provide me with your full name, address, telephone, and fax numbers via email. These details will be used to draft an agreement ensuring the smooth transition of ownership of the consignment to your name as the beneficiary. Upon receipt of your details and confirmation of your interest, the transaction can be finalized within seven working days. Your prompt response is appreciated. You can contact me via my Cell Telephone No: 234-80- 33055024 or my alternative E-mail: williamsfalana@caramail.com. Best regards, Barrister Williams Falana.

INTERNATIONAL PROMOTIONS/PRIZE AWARD DEPARTMENT
REF: WBL/67-B773524441

Dear Recipient,

We are delighted to announce the winners of the recent International Programs organized by WERKEN BIJ DE LOTTO, which took place on July 5, 2002. Your company, identified by ticket number 013-2316-2002-477 and serial number A025-09, has been selected as one of the winners in category C, having matched the lucky numbers 37-13-34-85-56-42.

You are entitled to a cash prize of US$1,500,000.00, part of the total prize fund of US$22,500,000.00 shared among fifteen international winners. Winners were chosen via a computerized ballot system from a pool of 30,000 names worldwide.

Congratulations on your winnings!

Your cash prize has been securely deposited with a Finance and Security House under your name and is insured. To protect the integrity of the process, we kindly request that you keep this award confidential until the claim procedure is finalized and your funds are transferred to your account. This is a precautionary measure to prevent any fraudulent activities or duplicate claims.

We anticipate that you will consider participating in our upcoming high-stakes International Lotto with a prize pool of US$1.3 billion at the end of the year.

To initiate your claim, please contact your designated claims officer promptly:

Foreign Service Manager, EUROLITE BV

For expediency and to prevent complications, please remember to include your reference number in all communications with your claims officer. Should there be any changes to your contact information, please notify your claims officer immediately.

Once again, congratulations from our team for your success and thank you for participating in our promotional events.

64ed6f00-6aec-4e0d-b733-0295bfc15466.body:
Hello,

I am reaching out to you seeking your assistance in a financial matter. I am the eldest son of the late Mobutu Sese Seko, the former President of the Congo Republic. Currently, I am in Nigeria as a political refugee. I came across your contact information online while looking for a trustworthy individual to collaborate with on a business opportunity.

This venture is mutually beneficial and involves a substantial sum of money, specifically 50 million US dollars. This sum is my inheritance from my father, which I secured in a security company overseas during a period of political unrest in my country. With the situation now stabilized, I am in need of a reliable person, such as yourself, to help me access and invest this inheritance anonymously.

In order to proceed with this opportunity, I will provide you with all necessary documents to authorize your access to the funds. To ensure confidentiality, I request the following from you:

1. A signed commitment to maintain the confidentiality of this transaction.
2. Confirmation of your capability to manage this endeavor.
3. Your international identity or driver's license number for identification purposes.
4. Your contact telephone and fax numbers for communication.
5. Your complete permanent address.

Once I receive the requested information, I will share the details of the security company holding the funds and arrange for them to contact you directly. Additionally, I will issue you a Letter of Authority to facilitate the release of the funds on my behalf.

Please respond promptly so that we can move forward together.

Thank you for your consideration.

Best regards,

Moshood Seko Mobutu

1e14f0e1-6331-4852-a76c-8f3300fc25ea.body: In the Spring of 1979, I was just a tall, goofy-looking kid in middle school, with buck-teeth and freckles. Every day in the cafeteria, I strolled from table to table, making deals. Instead of taking kids' lunch money, I offered to borrow a small sum, promising to return more. Eventually, as life progressed with high school, girls, homework, and parties, my middle school antics were forgotten. I managed to collect a reasonable amount without repercussions. Hidden in this experience are two valuable stock market lessons: avoid greed and be cautious of investment advisors. The key to success is understanding that the traditional stock market approach may not lead to quick wealth. Day trading, the focus of my learnings and subsequent success, offers the potential for significant gains. The basics are simple, and anyone can learn the principles to get started. Success in trading is often portrayed as complex to discourage average individuals from participating. However, with the right knowledge and determination, financial success can be attainable. I've distilled my trading wisdom into the Master Trader e-book, revealing strategies to profit from market volatility. Day trading offers the opportunity to make substantial profits in a short period. The book provides insights into trading stocks effectively, managing risks, and maintaining a winning state of mind. It empowers individuals to take control of their financial future through active trading. The Master Trader e-book equips readers with the tools to trade like professionals and potentially earn substantial income through informed trading decisions. For those seeking quick wealth in the market, day trading presents a low-risk, high-reward avenue that can lead to significant financial gains. To learn more, access the Master Trader e-book by visiting the following link: [http://4tools4life.com/qs]

564d8c99-220a-4aa8-bf8e-92bd6319b7dd.body:
Dear [Recipient's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I got your contact information from a reputable source, and I believe you can assist me based on your trustworthiness. My name is Laurent Mpeti Kabila, and I am the second son of the late President Laurent Desire Kabila of the Democratic Republic of Congo.

I have been tasked by my father's colleagues to seek your urgent cooperation. We have an opportunity to transfer US $25 million and some carats of diamonds into a bank account. These assets are currently held in a secure vault in Europe and South Africa.

The funds and diamonds are part of a larger budget my father allocated for defense purposes in 2000. Unfortunately, he was tragically assassinated before finalizing the arms deal, leaving funds in limbo. To honor his legacy, we have decided to move these assets to a trusted foreign entity - which could be you - to support our political endeavors.

Your role in this transaction is pivotal. Upon successful completion, a portion of the funds will be rightfully yours. We aim for a swift and confidential process, ensuring the security of all parties involved.

If you are interested in collaborating, please provide your personal telephone and fax details via email to commence the transaction. Your discretion in handling this matter with confidentiality is paramount.

I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to potentially working together.

Best regards,
Mpeti L. Kabila (Jnr)

a2e1bbf6-7b27-4139-b892-07d008448063.body: Dear Friend,  This last summer, our family had a wonderful reunion at a beautiful resort in Minnesota. The water was crystal clear, and the trees whispered in the gentle breeze. We enjoyed reconnecting with old friends, seeing how everyone's children had grown, and catching up on life stories. On the final day, we took a family photo to use for our holiday cards.  In October, when we received the photo proofs, I was surprised not to see myself clearly. After a closer look, I realized I had not noticed how much weight I had gained and how different I looked. It was a wake-up call. I knew I needed to make a change, but I struggled with diets and lacked the motivation to exercise regularly.  Then, I came across a product called BERRY TRIM PLUS that seemed to offer a solution. It promised to help with appetite control, boost energy, and aid in weight loss without extreme dieting or intense exercise. Skeptical but hopeful, I decided to give it a try.  After about six weeks, I started noticing positive changes. I felt more confident, and my appearance improved. The product not only helped me lose weight but also kept my skin firm. I feel rejuvenated and closer to my weight loss goal.  I can confidently say that BERRY TRIM PLUS lived up to its promises and helped me regain my self-esteem. If you're struggling with weight loss, I recommend trying it. To learn more about it, click below:  [CLICK HERE](http://vfda.weedwaacker.com/index0625a.html)  Sincerely, Laurie

e779f8c9-e5ec-4cc9-a7fb-0bb31410d351.body:
Hello,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to you regarding a matter that requires confidentiality and trust.

My name is Adewale Coker, a legal representative, and I used to work with the family of the late General Sani Abacha, a former military ruler of Nigeria. Since the passing of General Abacha, his family has faced difficulties from subsequent governments. 
The family has managed to move a substantial amount of money, approximately US$50 million, out of the country to a secure location in North America.

We are looking for assistance in handling this matter discreetly. If you are interested, we can designate you as the beneficiary of a portion of the funds, and you would receive 25% of the total sum after clearance from the security company.

This is a legitimate and low-risk opportunity, and I am directly involved as a confidant of the Abacha family. Your participation in this project would be greatly appreciated, and we are open to further collaboration in the future.

I await your prompt response.

Thank you,
Adewale Coker
